ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (3.4 ounce) package instant butterscotch pudding mix

cookingTips: Use pineapple with its juice to keep apples from browning
Chop apples just before assembling to prevent oxidation
Fold ingredients gently to maintain whipped topping's light texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user assemble this no-cook dessert salad by combining ingredients in the right order to prevent apples from browning.
